mutants.original_line: return ''.join((x for x in text if not x.isdigit()))
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((x for x in text if not x.isdigit()))
mutants.code:
def clean_text_of_numbers(text: str) -> str:
    """
    Removes all numeric characters from the input text while preserving all other characters.

    Parameters:
    text (str): The input string that may contain numbers and other characters.

    Returns:
    str: The cleaned string with all numeric characters removed.
    """
    return 'MUTATED'.join((x for x in text if not x.isdigit()))
